// Do not edit this file!
// The tests are auto generated from [FILE_NAME]

import { Ananse } from "ananse";

const ussd = new Ananse().configure({
	gateway: __GATEWAY__,
	session: __SESSION__,
});

__BUSINESS_LOGIN__

const port = process.argv[2];
if (port == null) {
	throw new Error(
		"Port is required. Please provide a port number as argument to the script",
	);
}
ussd.listen(parseInt(port), "localhost", () => {
	console.log(`Server listening on port ${port}`);
});
